channel.title: Getting Started on AirOne
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on AirOne

item.title: AirOne Overview
item.description: AirOne is an information management system with high flexibility of access control and high extensibility of data. This enables to manage information in any type of use-cases. This document describes these features. Data model that meets with extensibility AirOne manages informaiton by using following two type of data-structure. Entity - has meta data (what kind of data it has and how). Entry - has actual data in conformity to an Entity which is associated with it.
